attributes.review: The app is laid out decent but when you actually t try and do stuff it just crashes or takes for ever to load and I double checked my internet and everything it’s just not worth getting with how much it crashes
attributes.title: To slow

attributes.review: This has to be one of the worst apps on the store. There are so many bugs and spam that you get because of this app. Plus I think the data from this app is going straight to Russia? Maybe we should ban it from the US because that could be a national security threat!
attributes.title: Problems

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support the cheddar cheese stick and see what was going on and after i downloaded it and entered my phone i immediately started getting terrifying texts and death threats. one of them stated “the orange man is hungry reply with your credit card number now or he will eat your cat.” and they sent me MY ADRESS! DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!

attributes.review: Honestly I just wanted to have a place to escape how crazy the world is right now, thought trumps app would finally bring me some peace. The app crashed about 5 minutes into my first use and I’m beyond angry at this point. I expected better than this.
attributes.title: Disappointing... to say the least

attributes.review: Honestly, I wanted to give this app a chance but that was never possible. Horrible app. Terrible organization. Glitchy, just like Trump’s speeches because he cannot clearly state anything without stuttering. Full of lies 🥴 Clearly racist and misogynistic app, like disgusting. I hate it here. This app needs to go where Trump needs to go.. the trash.
attributes.title: JUST DISGUSTING

attributes.review: This app is one of the worst apps I’ve ever had. First of all, id like to point out that the opening picture of Donald Trump is him with a fist in the air. That is fist in the air is known for being the symbol of BLM. Trump has never shown support for the movement and should be doing this. Secondly the app is hard to use and navigate.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app took a full two days to download. When it did download I was appalled by it. 🍊✨. They were so many things wrong with  it. One including that it exists. I got several calls telling me I needed to ‘vote trump 2020’. Yeah haha okay 🤪. Funny funny. They need to hire a better comedian to make the calls. So yeah. One star. 😳👎🏻🧚🏼‍♀️✨💅🏼
attributes.title: Awful 🤮

attributes.review: I seriously got this app to see what Trump’s plans for the election was but the app kept crashing! and the notifications were out of control, i would get ten in a minute! Nonetheless the app took up WAY too much storage space! Do not buy this app i think i need a new phone!!
attributes.title: This App Broke My Phone

attributes.review:
took FOREVER to download and very laggy. Will not be getting this app ever again, thoroughly disappointed. Very scary too, the app started screaming at me and it even threatened to track and find me and my family😔😔 save your time and energy and stay away from this app

‼️‼️NOT WORTH THE TRAUMA, WOULD NOT RECOMMEND‼️‼️
attributes.title: BEWARE, too many problems

attributes.review: ugh honestly so disappointed. this app is disgusting. ever since i was a kid i dreamed of this figure. he was big. almost no hair. kinda wispy hair. and i’ve never seen what he’s looked like fully. but today this all changed. i opened up my trump 2020 app and all i saw was him. he was standing there like a complete baffoon and i now realize who the demon in my nightmares were. he was there during sleep paralysis and so much more. this pedophilic racist homophobic rude sexist figure has now been shown to me and i wish to never see him or anything of him ever again.
attributes.title: eva😩
